name: Sergio De Agostino
content: SergioDeAgostino < Users < TWiki Tags: tag this topic create new tag view all tags FirstName: Sergio LastName: De Agostino OrganisationName: Sapienza University of Rome OrganisationURL: http://w3.uniroma1.it/dipinfo/ Country: Italy Curriculum Vitae: 1987: Laurea (Italian MS) in Mathematics at Sapienza University of Rome. 1990-1994: Visiting Researcher at Brandeis University, USA where he received a Master of Arts in Computer Science. 1992: Ph. D. in Computer Science at Sapienza University of Rome. 1994: Hired as Lecturer at the Computer Science Department of Sapienza University of Rome. 1997: Tenured as Lecturer at the Computer Science Department of Sapienza University of Rome. 2000-2004: Assistant Professor at the Computer Science Department of Armstrong (now, Georgia Southern) University, USA. 2003-2004: Coordinator of the Master Program in Computer Science at Armstrong Atlantic State University. 2004: Tenured as Associate Professor at Armstrong Atlantic State University. 2004: Back to the Computer Science Department of Sapienza University of Rome in September. 2018: Signed and sent the Complaint Procedure Form below to the United Nations Human Rights Council (delivered on October 18). 2020: The Complaint was deemed inadmissible by the Council with no arguments (received on December 29). 2021: Pointed out to the Council the seventh article of the United Nations Universal Declaration of Human Rights (emailed on April 22). For my pubblications see papers.pdf http://www.python.it/doc/Howtothink/Howtothink-html-it/index.htm (materiale del corso: cap. 1-4, cap. 6-8, par. 11.4, cap. 12) https://uniroma1.zoom.us/j/85105956187?pwd=aWh0NGcrT1NZRll1dWJmYW9XYm5WQT09 (link lezioni ed esame scritto informatica) https://www.greenteapress.com/thinkpython/thinkCSpy.pdf Attachments Attachments Topic attachments I Attachment History Action Size Date Who Comment pdf DeAgostino.pdf r1 manage 237.8 K 2019-04-23 - 17:42 SergioDeAgostino pdf HRCComplaintProcedureForm.pdf r1 manage 435.4 K 2019-04-17 - 16:58 SergioDeAgostino pdf appello1.pdf r1 manage 89.8 K 2025-06-12 - 08:18 SergioDeAgostino pdf appello2.pdf r1 manage 91.0 K 2025-06-12 - 08:56 SergioDeAgostino pdf appellostr..pdf r1 manage 92.8 K 2025-06-30 - 11:17 SergioDeAgostino pdf draft.pdf r6 r5 r4 r3 r2 manage 103.8 K 2024-10-23 - 15:27 SergioDeAgostino pdf esami.pdf r1 manage 122.6 K 2025-01-21 - 19:31 SergioDeAgostino pdf exercises.pdf r18 r17 r16 r15 r14 manage 132.4 K 2024-10-23 - 17:01 SergioDeAgostino pdf papers.pdf r23 r22 r21 r20 r19 manage 116.3 K 2023-09-28 - 20:29 SergioDeAgostino pdf python.pdf r41 r40 r39 r38 r37 manage 103.0 K 2023-12-27 - 21:18 SergioDeAgostino pdf soluzione.pdf r4 r3 r2 r1 manage 90.7 K 2025-06-30 - 11:39 SergioDeAgostino Edit | Attach | Watch | Print version | History: r188 < r187 < r186 < r185 < r184 | Backlinks | Raw View | Raw edit | More topic actions Topic revision: r188 - 2025-06-30 - SergioDeAgostino Log In or Register Users Web ...
